216375932184395846.NAME: You are no longer a member of House Redoran. If you can make amends, do so. Then we can speak of your stronghold.

25725768831678972.NAME: It is finished. You have a home to rival that of any House Redoran Councilor.

2010118207227512960.NAME: The last stage of your stronghold is under construction.

15815302591153123672.NAME: I am ready to give you a stronghold fit for a House Redoran Councilor. But first you must speak with Hetman Guls at your stronghold. Ask him what must be done to attract more settlers.

315227697298816094.NAME: The second stage of your stronghold is complete. Speak with me again when you need a stronghold fit for a House Redoran Councilor.

240611293709011872.NAME: The next stage of your stronghold is under construction.

100193709154894506.NAME: The foundations for your stronghold are complete. If you wish to build the next stage of your stronghold, you must hire guards to garrison your stronghold.

1847159102453819895.NAME: Yes, the stronghold will be finished soon.

29857137631558429451.NAME: So what did Durbul gro-Rush say? What? He's dead? Well, that's that. Without Durbul gro-Rush, you can't build a stronghold. That's it. The end. Finish. No stronghold, no advancement in House Hlaalu. It's a pity, but there's nothing I can do.

19401152922884013646.NAME: It is good to hear that the stronghold is progressing well. The work should be finished soon.

172776430285026284.NAME: Yes, %PCName. I want you to make sure your stronghold is being built on schedule. Go to your stronghold, which is being built among the rows of stones, the Bal Isra, on the east side of the road from Ald'ruhn to Maar Gan. Speak with the foreman, Bugdul gro-Kharbush. I will mark it on your map.

8693119302157720605.NAME: Construction on your stronghold should begin soon. In a week or so, come speak with me again.

3225412092449315536.NAME: Yes, this is adequate, %PCName. Your stronghold will be built in the Bal Isra on the road to Maar Gan. Construction will begin as soon as I give the orders.

221299771208702117.NAME: You have the construction contract, yes, but I must also have 5000 drakes for labor and materials.

2458170593155921281.NAME: You do not have the construction contract. Speak with Duke Dren in Ebonheart. Only he may issue construction contracts.

92211361299731290.NAME: Without the proper papers and resources, I cannot build your stronghold. I am sure you understand, %PCName.

13110297411303130332.NAME: Do you have the 5000 drakes and the construction contract?
13110297411303130332.BNAM: Choice "Yes, here they are." 1 "No, not yet." 2

20438147671853114989.NAME: If you want me to build you a stronghold, I will need 5000 drakes for labor and materials. You must also bring me a construction contract from Duke Dren in Ebonheart.

1937263771791624555.NAME: I only offer my services to those who have earned at least the rank of Kinsman.

10811275601658326379.NAME: Speak with Galsa Gindu in the Redoran Council Hall. She can contract to build strongholds.

18669202981966625426.NAME: You've been expelled. If you want to improve your stronghold, you'll need to make amends.

487814942695519454.NAME: Your stronghold is complete, %PCRank. It rivals that of the greatest Hlaalu councilors.

2890920405205744078.NAME: I have given the orders to begin the final stages of your stronghold, %PCRank.

2475085552784532466.NAME: You have earned a high rank in House Hlaalu, and I am prepared to give you the stronghold you deserve, %PCName. Alas, before anyone would be willing to move to your stronghold, you must find a way to guard against bandits that prey on your trade.

858884131743224106.NAME: The improvements to your stronghold are complete. Speak with me again when you need a stronghold fit for a Councilor of House Hlaalu.

30817221541316219332.NAME: I have given the orders to being the next phase of construction. Give it some time, %PCName.

23971187499022033.NAME: Ilasour Tansumiran and Llaals Ores seem to be the only unemployed miners who could have helped you. And now, If Ilasour Tansumiran and Llaals Ores are dead, that is the end of your ambitions. A stronghold that cannot support itself -- and its House -- is no stronghold at all. So there will be no stronghold for you, and no more advancement.

2949715060269753685.NAME: If the kwama queen at Shurdan-Raplay is dead, that is the end of your ambitions. A stronghold that cannot support itself -- and its House -- is no stronghold at all. So there will be no stronghold for you, and no more advancement.

2072831565365012730.NAME: Your stronghold is now helping House Hlaalu with business and trade. I will give the orders to begin the next phase of construction.

613523027323753169.NAME: When you are ready to improve your stronghold, you will need to find some business to engage in, such as farming or egg mining.

21958180201981124098.NAME: So what did Durbul gro-Rush say? Ah, that is good news. Your stronghold should be ready soon, then. Thank you for keeping me up to date.

5491503190518753.NAME: Just go talk to Durbul gro-Rush at the site of your new stronghold.

1310310632278216330.NAME: I want you to go check on your stronghold and talk to the foreman, Durbul gro-Rush, to make sure everything is going as planned. Rethan Manor is being built on the Odai Plateau. If you follow the Odai River south of Balmora, you should see construction to the southwest after the wood bridge. I will mark it on your map.

2197287502993129811.NAME: The construction should begin any day now.

30709929292501221.NAME: Yes, everything seems to be in order. I will give the orders to being construction.

1059613763297482044.NAME: I'm not buying that story, %PCName. Either give me the papers or stop wasting my time.

30977234301932516985.NAME: I can't build your stronghold without the proper papers. Go see Baren Alen in Vivec and Duke Vedam Dren in Ebonheart.

1915214883106281056.NAME: Do you have the proper papers?
1915214883106281056.BNAM: Choice "Yes, here it is." 1 "No, not yet." 2

128111350625721310.NAME: If you want to build a stronghold, I must have a construction contract and a land deed. Baren Alen at the Hlaalu Vaults in Vivec can provide you with the land deed, but you must speak with Duke Vedam Dren to get the construction contract.

10635362386624057.NAME: I cannot accept contracts for strongholds from anyone under the rank of Kinsman.

762501129861747.NAME: For matters regarding your tower, you should speak with Llunela Hleran at the Telvanni Council House in Sadrith Mora.

1652623272852632620.NAME: You have brought me the book "Secrets of Dwemer Animunculi." Soon you will have a stronghold that rivals that of Uvirith himself.

25934160331574116547.NAME: Yes, I am prepared to build the last stage of your stronghold. Your stronghold will be the first since the fall of Resdayn to be guarded by Dwemer Animunculi.

593723559356618458.NAME: The second stage of your stronghold is complete. I trust everything is in order? Speak with me again when you are a Master of House Telvanni and I will build you a stronghold fit for the mightiest Telvanni wizards.

31375718763786812.NAME: I have given the orders to begin construction on the next phase of your stronghold.

15832852944213578.NAME: Yes, this will do. I shall give the orders to begin construction on the rest of your stronghold.

53123035699616359.NAME: And I suppose you are keeping them at your stronghold? No, you must bring them to me.

318079627563899.NAME: Do not waste my time until you have found the things I seek.

2707041149329678.NAME: Do you have the Dwemer schematics from Mzanchend and the 5000 gold?

2511925408261659096.NAME: If you want me to build you a tower fit for a Telvanni Councilor, I will need 5000 drakes for expenses. I also want you to investigate the Dwemer ruin of Mzanchend northwest of your stronghold. Bring me any plans or schematics you find there.

2996822411348532595.NAME: Speak with me again when the first stage of your tower is complete. It will only take a few days for it to finish growing.

301493228980727806.NAME: I am pleased to hear that the mushroom is growing so well. Thank you for keeping me informed. Your stronghold should finish its first stage of growth in a few days.

23782324311315258.NAME: Yes, I want you to check on your stronghold, which is being built on the alleged site of Uvirith's Grave. I will mark it on your map. Go there and speak with Gashnak gra-Mughol, the foreman in charge of constructing your stronghold.

89881092181518027.NAME: Construction on your stronghold will begin soon.
